products.title: Hanson Sand
products.description: Hanson sand made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Hanson Sand Vertical Blind
products.description: A lightly textured fabric made up of beige and grey tones, which would compliment the furnishings in any living room or bedroom. Available in other colours. Dim out options are available in the henlow range. Hanson sand vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Hanson Sand (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
